Posts.Content: On Apr 27, 2008 12:00 AM donnalynn wrote: I too am having somewhat of the same problem.  I had long thick hair prior to chemo and now it has grown back but the top is very thin and see-through. I am wondering if it has anything to do with the Arimidex that I am now taking.  Are you taking anything now? Hi  I also finished treatment in januay TNBC i did 4 rounds of A/c then only made it thru 6 weeks Taxol  the lumpectomy but after 9 months hair growing back but so thin on top  I dont know what to do  but this disease takes your self esteem I need to look better .. starting with hair would be great.. yes I take biotin cullagen vitamin b12 d3 and c     what can we do more?
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
